page.title: 19New Houses
page.content: There is a lot of disagreement about the building of seven new houses in the village. People like the insides of these houses but the outsides dont match the older houses here. We are sorry that the new houses haven't been better designed to save energy, e.g. they should have double glazing. David,who lives in one of the new houses, likes his house and likes the men who are building the new houses. He also says that they cost a lot of money to build and buy. Sarah wants to see more families live in the area but Sara doesn't want the quiet of the village to be spoiled.
